item.title: Building a Mattermost Chatbot in Perl
item.description: Introduction WebService::Mattermost is an alternative Mattermost chatbot library written in Perl. It provides two interfaces to the Mattermost API and WebSocket gateway: from a script, and as a base for Moo and Moose classes. In this article, I will cover how to use it in a basic script, and demonstrate with a bot which greets users.
